aboutMe.subtitle: KNOW ABOUT ME
aboutMe.heading: Web Developer and a little bit of {highlighted}
aboutMe.descriptionP1: Hi, I'm Patryk, a full-stack developer passionate about building vibrant web applications. I excel at solving complex challenges, whether I'm on the frontend with Nuxt.js and TypeScript or diving into the backend with Node.js and Fastify.
aboutMe.descriptionP2: I believe in maintaining a healthy work-life balance, and my natural curiosity gives me a fresh perspective on everything I do. For me, every day is an opportunity to build something great.
